fields.summary: Quicknav should include plural matches
Preview does not keep the space logo size
Add The Ability to Watch Labels

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29615].
  {panel}

After logo upload, the "Reset to Default Logo" link reverts to the default Confluence colour scheme. This is because there is now a relationship between the logo and the colour scheme in Confluence 5.x - uploading a logo will customise your colour scheme to match the logo. Resetting the logo to default also updates the colour scheme to match, but this is not communicated and there is no option to undo it.

Found in Confluence 5.0.3, 5.1.3.

h3 .Steps to Reproduce:
# In the admin panel, create a custom colour scheme.
# Upload a new site logo. The colour scheme changes to match the logo.
# Click the Reset to Default Logo button.
#- Notice that color scheme reverts to the standard Atlassian colour scheme, not the previously selected custom colour scheme.

h3. Desired behaviour
One of these options:
# A way to undo the colour scheme change after resetting the logo
# Stop the logo reset changing the colour scheme
# Communicate the impending colour scheme change in the link text
fields.summary: After logo upload, "Undo" link doesn't revert the colour scheme

fields.description:
When copy-n-paste ascii text with more than one space between words, spaces reduced to exactly one, breaking pre-formatting.

It observed in code block, no-format block, and pre-formatted style of regular paragraph, on multiple browsers.

Note, that keyboard input does not affected. Only paste from clipboard op.
fields.summary: pasting pre-formatted text to code, no-format blocks kills spaces

fields.description:
Browse menu is missing in Confluence header after importing [Confluence 5.0 Complete Documentation XML|http://downloads.atlassian.com/software/confluence/downloads/documentation/Confluence_5-0-2_CompleteDocumentation_XML_DOC-20130327.zip]. You are required to hover onto the header (besides 'Create' button) to see Browse menu.

The issue lies on the Stylesheet configured in the space. Reverting the Stylesheet to default solved the problem. 

We should update [Confluence 5.0 Complete Documentation XML|http://downloads.atlassian.com/software/confluence/downloads/documentation/Confluence_5-0-2_CompleteDocumentation_XML_DOC-20130327.zip] to avoid this issue from happening to end users who downloaded the file and restore it to their local instances as it prevents them from accessing important pages such as Space Admin and Space Operations. The same problem can be seen from https://confluence.atlassian.com

UPDATE: The issue has been fixed in [Confluence 5.1 Complete Documentation XML|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/ALLDOC/Confluence+Documentation+Directory].
fields.summary: Browse menu is missing in Confluence header after importing Confluence 5.0 Complete Documentation XML

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29612].
  {panel}

Steps to recreate:
1. Create a wiki page with attached images and display them in the wiki page and Save
2: Click edit and copy text and images 
3. Create a blog post and paste text and images on the page and save.
4. Now the blogpost looks exactly as the wiki page
5. BUT when other users are viewing the blogpost no images are shown; probably because they're not attached.
6. But I continue as the only user to be able to see the images even after closing browser or  emptying the browser cache.
fields.summary: Copy and paste of images fails using IE9 browser

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29608].
  {panel}

In many different contexts, Confluence will not be able to start because the Build Number in the home-dir is different from the one in the installation files.

The following error is reported:
"Confluence will not start up because the build number in the home directory"

The page doesn't have instructions for the Admin forcing them to create a Support ticket.

The error message page should explain the problem and point to a KB with solutions.

!BuildNumber.png!
fields.summary: Update Build Number Error Message so that it can tell Admins what to do
Keynote support for viewfile macro

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29604].
  {panel}

Similar to what we did with the WidgetConnector YouTube macro - we load an image in the editor, we could do the same for the Viewfile macro PPT files.

So when you upload your PPT file inside Confluence, instead of getting this: 
!http://cl.ly/image/413x1C002A0D/Image%202013.06.12%2011%3A19%3A42%20AM.png!

You get this:
!http://cl.ly/image/1c1p0q1R0Q1f/Image%202013.06.12%2011%3A22%3A11%20AM.png!

Where that is the first slide
fields.summary: For the viewfile macro PPT files, load the first image of the slide as the macro placeholder

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29603].
  {panel}

If you use the attachments macro and specify a page to use in the macro properties, when the macro is rendered out the attachment preview fails. It seems it is looking to the local page for the attachment to render it rather than the page the attachment is really on.
h3. Steps to reproduce:
 # In a space, create a page and insert an attachment.
 # Create another page, and insert the attachment macro. Configure it to list the attachment from the page in step 1.
 # Save the page and view it. The attachment from the other page is linked, and the link is valid. But when you expand to see the details of the attached file, there's no preview, and the following error is thrown: "Error rendering macro 'viewfile' : The viewfile macro is unable to locate the attachment "xxxx.xxx" on this page"

The viewfile macro is looking for the attachment on the page that references the attachment.
fields.summary: Attachments Macro Errors Rendering Attachment

fields.description: When using Confluence as an anonymous user (not logged in), when hitting Shift+? the Keyboard shortcut gallery appears. But the first item has what looks to be an error or a missing string.
fields.summary: Keyboard Shortcut description missing

fields.description:
In the documentation, customers are informed that they must upgrade to a stable release of the OD-X-BTF version as soon as it is releases. Otherwise, their instances are not supported.

However, at the moment, the upgrade is not possible because the build numbers in OD-X-BTF are always higher than BTF.

Error message:
{code}
Confluence will not start up because the build number in the home directory [3289] doesn't match the build number in the database [2166].
{code}

Consequences:
- There is no path to migrate from OD-X-BTF to BTF
- Atlassian can't say that it doesn't support OD-X-BTF when the stable version was released
fields.summary: OD-X-BTF build numbers are always higher than BTF build numbers

fields.description:
The Confluence 5.1.3 installer is ignoring the input to "Existing installation directory". The text indicates that the default is [/usr/share/confluence]. However, the installer upgraded my _backup_ at /usr/share/confluence-5.0-pre-upgrade-5.1.3.

I tried the installation AGAIN this time explicitly entering "/usr/share/confluence" and it still tries to upgrade my backup directory.
fields.summary: Installer upgrades wrong directory

  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29592].
  {panel}

We are in contact with the Atlassian Japan members using confluence.atlassian.co.jp.

When replying or editing to  the comment on confluence.atlassian.co.jp, we have to wait a long time.

This happens when using Chrome or Firefox. It does not happen when using  IE.

I recorded this phenomenon.
Please extract the attached file and see the confluence.atlassian.co.jp.html.

fields.description:
When we upgraded to the current version of Confluence (uncertain of previous version but I believe it was a 3.x release), all pages containing code blocks started rendering them wrong.  Previously, they were rendered using a tab width of 8 which is the standard default setting in most text editors, now they are rendered using a tab width of 4, and there does not appear to be any way to configure this.

Additionally, when one selects text from a code block and pastes it somewhere else, it is pasted with spaces rather than tabs.  Previously, tabs would be copied and pasted.

The previous behavior was highly desirable and useful to us.
fields.summary: Tab rendering in code blocks changed width and copy/paste ability was lost

fields.description:
We discovered the problem while filtering spaces in confluence.

When we try to filter out the space called "ABC-SHP2" it cannot be filtered it by typing "ABC-SH" or "ABC-SHP" in uppercase, but it is being filtered if I type complete name "ABC-SHP2",
On the other hand if I type this name in lower case, it will be filtered properly. And spaces without numerals are filtered properly even with uppercase.

The problem can only be reproduce with 
* Spaces in uppercase, and
* Spaces with alphanumeric names


Here is a screenshot showing the spaces we have on the instance :
!Screen shot 2013-06-19 at 9.50.05 AM.png!


and here you can see that the spaces are not returned when typing ABC in the filter box.
!Screen shot 2013-06-19 at 9.50.29 AM.png!
fields.summary: Problem filtering confluence spaces in uppercase

fields.description:
Description of the problem:
The title name of my macro( here it is a code-block) is "Reboot". When  I am giving the word  "Reboot" into the search field, I don't get any results. Only when the content of the macro has got the word "Reboot", then there is a result. But never when I'm searching for the title name in macros( code-block, tip etc.).

Can anyone help me?
fields.summary: No search results when typing title names of macros

fields.description:
h3. *Current Behavior* 
- Pressing Page Up button does not scroll up in the edit mode page.
- Pressing Page Down button does not scroll up in the edit mode page.

h3. *Expected Behaviour*
- Pressing Page Up button scrolls up in the edit mode page.
- Pressing Page Down button scrolls down in the edit mode page.

{quote}
When you switch to the edit/preview mode, Page down/Page up keys don't work.
Also the other cursor keys up and down don't work.
This happens with Firefox, Chrome and IE8.
Using IE8 Page down/Page up keys don't work in edit mode.

This worked in Confluence 3.5.
{quote}
fields.summary: Page Down/Page Up don't work in the editor

fields.description:
When embedding a WMV file in Confluence, it will play in IE but not Chrome or Firefox despite having the proper plugins installed.  Please see attached screen shot for the visual error.

*Steps to reproduce*
# Download attached example WMV file
# Drag and drop into a Confluence page
# Save the page 
# View page in Chrome of Firefox

Interestingly enough, this same WMV file can be viewed in Chrome without incident [here|http://ia700505.us.archive.org/3/items/Windows7WildlifeSampleVideo/Wildlife.wmv].  The difference appears the be that Confluence defines the type="application/octet-stream" where as the above page, where this works, is of type="video/x-ms-wmv".  Perhaps using octet is too generic and the file type should be specified?
fields.summary: MultiMedia WMV file fails to play with error 'this operation couldn't be completed the file is not a movie file (-2048)' In Chrome or FireFox

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29569].
  {panel}

When you try to select or deselect all permissions for a specific user at *Confluence Admin > Space Permissions > Individual Users* for usernames that have number-only username, a Javascript error is thrown and the action is not performed.

*Steps to reproduce*
# Create an user with username containing only numbers e.g. 12345
# Navigate to *Confluence Admin > Space Permissions > Manage Permissions> Individual Users*, click *Edit Permissions*
# Select and *Add* the user
# Click on the cog icon, press *Select All* or *Deselect All*
fields.summary: Space permissions for individual users/groups - de/select all does not work with number-only names

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29568].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce:

1.) Create a requirment page in Confluence (Blueprints).
2.) Modify the page title to "Test".
3.) Insert a Jira Issue with the Jira Issue Macro somewhere in the template.

Problem: I have to copy the page title of the requirment manually to the summary of the jira issue. It would be much more comfortable if the macro could use page title of the requirement as default for the jira summary.

Another really useful feature would be a macro to create a button "Create Jira Issue" on the requirements template. The jira issue could be generated without any interaction of the user by configure this button to use a special jira project and a special issue type e.g. requirement. The summary and the description could be generated with the content of the requirement blueprint.
There is to much work needed (clicking and user interaction) to create an jira issue in my opinion.
fields.summary: Copy requirement page title (Blueprints) automatically to Jira Issue Summary

fields.description:
I recently updated my confluence to 5.1.3 from 4.3, then this bug appeared.

When someone try to edit an existing document, it takes about 20 seconds to load the existing contents(until then, the textarea shows just blank), and it includes a refresh.

How can I resolve this problem?
fields.summary: Loading the existing document to edit takes 20 secs

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce:

# Edit a page
# Take a "Printscreen" or use Windows' "Snippet Tool" to saved your screen to clipboard
# Use "CTRL + V" to attach it into the page
# Confluence will attach the image file from the clipboard to the page
# Ensure there are multiple attachment on the page
# Saved the page
# Go to attachment menu from the "Tools" button
# Click "Download All" button
# Confluence will throw the following ERROR
{code}
Cause
java.io.FileNotFoundException: D:\AtlassianData\Confluence\502data\temp\downloadf5o6S163731\image2013-6-6 16:36:21.png (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect)
    at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
Stack Trace:[hide]
java.io.FileNotFoundException: D:\AtlassianData\Confluence\502data\temp\downloadf5o6S163731\image2013-6-6 16:36:21.png (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect){code}

h3. Expected Results:

User should be able to download the zipped attachments

h3. Actual Results:

Users does not able to download the attachments and thrown an ERROR page instead. Judging from the stack trace, it seems that Confluence unable to find the temp file generated by the function.

h3. Cause
This problem is caused because the filename contains a colon (':') which is not a character allowed in a filename according to [MS Windows documentation|http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa365247(v=vs.85).aspx]. Due to the invalid name, Confluence is not able to create the file in the temp folder to generate the ZIP file.

This bug appears only when Confluence is running on Windows.
fields.summary: Images attached to a page from Clipboard (via Printscreen) cannot be downloaded via "Download All" in Windows
Extend Page Properties Report macro to support specified column order
Extend Page Properties Report macro to support sorting

fields.description:
h1. Steps to reproduce
# Enter a paragraph of text that finishes in italics
# Hit return.
# Type some more text (you will still be typing in italics)
# Backspace to the start of this second line (the "i" indicator in the toolbar will go off suggesting that italics are disabled)
# Continue typing (text will still be italics even though the toolbar is disabled)
# If the user backspaces their text (because they were not expecting italics for some reason) and presses CMD/CTRL + "i" it will enable italics in the toolbar - which is unexpected because they were just typing in italics

*Workaround:* 
* If the user again backspaces their text and then presses (CMD/CTRL + "i") twice then italics will be disabled, but this is a bit of a long-winded way to get there
*  select the italic type and CMD + I it.
fields.summary: Can't get out of italics in editor after starting a new line

fields.description:

- IE: 9.0.8112.16421
fields.summary: German umlauts get deleted in instructional text of global templates

Installing the plugin https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.editor-height-fix does not fix this problem.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29548].
  {panel}

h3. Summary of bug

Usually, in the file system, the user wouldn't be able to add certain special characters (like '/'). However, in Confluence, once an attachment has been added, they can do that. This would result in the attachment being unable to be found.

h3. Steps to replicate

These steps would use the slash ('/') as an example of a special character

# Attach a file into your Confluence page
# At the attachments page, click on the 'Properties' of the attachment
# Edit the name of the attachment so that there is a '/' in the name of the attachment
# Save the changes, and then try to access the attachment
fields.summary: Confluence allows changing of attachment name to special characters that are usually not permitted

fields.description:
There is a problem with including archived spaces into search list: if I
enable to include them and the list extends the number of listed entries
at the first page, on klick to the next (or 2...) the include archive
option is removed and so no archived spaces are listed. (v 5.1.3)

How to reproduce: have several spaces with pages, that deals with an
item to search, whereas one space is of status archived. The results
list for search the item exceeds one page. Activate the include archives option. On klick to the next page (or 2nd..) the option disapears and no results from archived pages are shown

For example I fill page property Last modified date using this macro.

fields.description:
h3.Steps to Reproduce
* Launch Internet Explorer
* Navigate to {{Internet Options >> Security}}
* Do the following for all zones:
*# Click *Custom Level...*
*# In the resulting *Security Settings* prompt, look for the *Downloads* section, and set Font download to *Disable*
*# Click *OK* and then *Apply* (remember to repeat these 3 steps for all zones)
* Restart the OS
* Navigate to Confluence after the restart, and notice that the Confluence Top Nav Bar now looks like this:
!icons.jpg!

The issue is also affecting FF browser

h3.Workaround for IE:
* In Internet Explorer, navigate to {{Tools >> Internet Options >> Security}}
* Do the following for all zones:
*# Click *Custom level...*
*# In the resulting *Security Settings* prompt, look for the *Downloads* section, and set *Font download* to *Enable*.
*# Click *OK* and then *Apply* (remember to repeat these 3 steps for all zones)
* If this does not work, then there could be other reasons causing this. Best would be to try to download the font pack manually via: [http://<yourConfluenceURL>/s/en_GB-1988229788/4226/d7686547091e645d7b0285207c0b86be721c74eb.1/5.0/_/download/resources/com.atlassian.auiplugin:aui-experimental-iconfont/atlassian-icons.ttf] to see if indeed, Confluence is serving that font pack correctly.
* Customers running Confluence in SSL will need to add the following to {{<CONFLUENCE_INSTALLATION>/conf/server.xml}} (within the {{<Context ... />}} element):
{code}
<Valve className="org.apache.catalina.authenticator.NonLoginAuthenticator"
       disableProxyCaching="true" securePagesWithPragma="false" />
{code}
After that, restart Confluence. Thanks to [~kevin.hughes] for this suggestion

* [Installation of Java with IE plugin|http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/internet-explorer/install-java#ie=ie-10]

h3.Workaround for FF:
* Type about:config in FF URL bar
* Search for "browser.display.use_document_fonts". The value is set to 0
* Reset it to the default value 1 to fix the problem
fields.summary: Icons on Confluence Top Navigation Bar Rendered as Letters in Internet Explorer & Firefox
Pagination fails when viewing labels with non-ASCII characters
Passwords of configured SMTP mail accounts are stored in cleartext

Saving the page and re-editing has no effect; switching the browser from full-screen to windowed mode has no effect; restarting the browser has no effect.

Somehow the page is stuck in 'edit in tiny window' mode.

Improving Printing of Check Lists in Confluence - printing the actual check icon

fields.description:
When developing a Confluence macro, the {{ConversionContext}} instance passed in to the macro's {{execute}} method can be used to determine the state of the system and the context in which the macro is being rendered.

This is important for macro authors, as it may be important for the macro to behave differently depending on the parent context (eg. different behaviour if the macro is in a comment vs. macro in a blog post).

Unfortunately, there is an edge case in the {{ConversionContext}} where the context is not set correctly when a render executes for a new, un-saved comment. 

Here's what the {{ConversionContext}} looks like for a page preview:

{noformat}
entity: page: my page title v.1 (80314858)
entity type: page
output type: display
original context entity: page: my page title v.1 (80314858)
page title: my page title
content status: current
content creation date: 2013-05-25 11:07:31.886
content type: page
content display title: my page title
content id: 80314858
content title: my page title
{noformat}

And here's what the {{ConversionContext}} looks like for a new comment preview:

{noformat}
entity: page: my page title v.1 (80314858)
entity type: page
output type: display
original context entity: page: my page title v.1 (80314858)
page title: my page title
content status: current
content creation date: Sat May 25 11:07:31 CDT 2013
content type: page
content display title: my page title
content id: 80314858
content title: my page title
{noformat}

As you can see, they are essentially identical. This makes it almost impossible for a macro to identify when it is being rendered as part of a new comment preview.

This can have serious implications if the macro enforces certain behaviour based on whether or not the user has edit page permissions.
fields.summary: Macros cannot determine when they are being rendered in a preview of a new comment

fields.description:
h3. Summary of Bug

If the Page Properties macro is used in a template, along with a variable as the value of the page property, the macro will face an error when trying to create from template, and the macro will be erased when the page is created.

h3. Steps to replicate

# Create a template that uses the Page Properties macro, with a label property set and with a variable as a value :
!page properties with variable.png|thumbnail!
# Try to create a page using that template. There will be an error in the Page Template Wizard :
!page template wizard.png|thumbnail!
# If the user clicks on 'Next', the resulting page creation section will no longer have the Page Properties Macro

h3. Additional Info

* Tested in Confluence 5.1.2
* Tested in Firefox 21
fields.summary: Page Properties Macro does not work if used with a label and variable in a template/blueprint

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29527].
  {panel}

Upon clicking on Thumbnail image does not open if placed in Table.
Steps to reproduce:
1) Attach Image to Confluence page (0.5meg, 1280x720, .jpg in my case)
2) Resize thumbnail to any size 
3) Save page and notice thumbnail opens large image upon clicking
4) Edit page
5) Create Table (1 columns, 2 rows)
6) Move image into 1st table row. 
7) Save page and notice thumbnail now does not open image any more.
(moving image back out of table, makes it work again)

Just extend functionality you already have (tables+picture tool):

* Add "caption" option in picture tools / or in effects. 
* Caption option opens sort of "insert table" menu with picture in middle and selectable Left/Right/Up/Down options. Selecting those 1-4 basically creates table cells around picture(with disabled ordering feature).
* Add options for text rotation inside that cell if not already there, so it's possible to write from top to bottom on right side for instance. (didn't try)
* If adding it into "effect" don't name it Instant Camera it's confusing.
fields.summary: Image placed in table does not resize.

fields.description:

* Create a new page
* In a bullet, add the attachment macro with default settings
* Outside of the bulleted list, add a few tasks
* Save the page

When you view the page, formatting is broken after the upload drop zone (screenshot_uploadtrue.png). When you disallow upload, formatting is fine (screenshot_uploadfalse.png).
fields.summary: Page layout breaks when using attachments macro inside ordered list

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29520].
  {panel}

When you increase the number of pages with referenced properties, the time taken to render the report increases exponentially.

+10 pages containing properties+ 
Response is 1.72s from the space and ~2 seconds to render the report successfully.

+20 pages containing properties+ 
Response is 5.85 seconds from the space and 6 seconds to render the report.

+30 pages containing properties+ 
Response is 15.5 seconds from the space and 16 seconds to render the report.

To improve this performance could a cache of the results be saved and be referenced before reload.  Alternatively could the delta between content additions be referenced instead of the entire space?

This behaviour has been replicated on multiple instances.
fields.summary: Page Property Report Macro Performance

fields.description: See attached screenshots from a customer having this problem with IE8 when they try to search for issues.
fields.summary: IE8 - error searching for JIRA issues
Page restrictions should be available in blog posts
Trigger dialog open/update event for labels dialog.
The use of Horizontal Rules should be more user friendly

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29515].
  {panel}

Hi team, would it be feasible to move the gallery's horizontal scroll bar to the top of the gallery?

We've discovered that when employees use the Gallery macro and they have the sidebar expanded, they only see three out of the default four columns of the gallery macro. Often, due to the way that the gallery shows three columns almost perfectly in the default theme, it's not clear that there is a fourth column at all, unless one scrolls down the entire gallery and notices the horizontal scroll bar at the bottom. As a result, employees sometimes miss an entire column of images.

Would it be feasible to move the scroll bar to the top of the gallery when there are too many columns to display onscreen? This would be a quick and easy visual indicator that the employee will need to scroll to see the full gallery.

Thanks for considering it,
Joe
fields.summary: request to move the gallery scroll bar to the top of the gallery

fields.description:
h3.Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page
# Insert an image *From the Web*. You can link it to an image hosted in an anonymously-accessible Confluence instance. 
# Make sure that the page renders the image properly, then shutdown the server that hosts the image, or simply remove the image
# Export the page created earlier to Word

Notice that the following stack trace will be thrown:
{code}
2013-06-03 23:38:52,775 ERROR [http-8512-5] [ContainerBase.[Standalone].[localhost].[/c512]] log Unhandled exception occurred whilst decorating page
 -- url: /c512/exportword | userName: admin | referer: http://localhost:8512/c512/display/ds/testdasdsa
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeUtility.getEncoding(MimeUtility.java:226)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeUtility.getEncoding(MimeUtility.java:299)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeBodyPart.updateHeaders(MimeBodyPart.java:1375)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeBodyPart.updateHeaders(MimeBodyPart.java:1021)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeMultipart.updateHeaders(MimeMultipart.java:419)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeBodyPart.updateHeaders(MimeBodyPart.java:1354)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage.updateHeaders(MimeMessage.java:2107)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage.saveChanges(MimeMessage.java:2075)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage.writeTo(MimeMessage.java:1770)
	at javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage.writeTo(MimeMessage.java:1749)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.servlet.ExportWordPageServer.service(ExportWordPageServer.java:188)
{code}

h3.Observation
Editing the page again to try to remove the broken image is not possible, as the image will be "hidden". 

h3.Workaround
# Install the [Confluence Source Editor|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.editor.confluence-source-editor]
# Edit the page, then click on the *<>* button on the top right corner of the editor
# Look for the broken image, example:
{code}
<ac:image>
    <ri:url ri:value="http://localhost:8420/c42/download/attachments/589826/global.logo"/>
  </ac:image>
{code}
# Remove the broken image tags, or change the link to a valid link for the image (if the image have been moved)
# Hit *Apply*, and save the page
fields.summary: Export to Word throws NullPointerException when Remote Images cannot be loaded
Confluence Cluster Installation with Existing Data no longer works.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29512].
  {panel}

h3. Summary of Bug

When using the Confluence Page Gadget to show more than 1 page at a time, sometimes the display of certain pages gets shortened. This behavior is random, and sometimes which display gets shortened changes.

h3. Steps to replicate

# Create a page, and insert two (or more) Confluence Page Gadget into it
# Configure the Page gadget to show different pages, and then save it

h3. Additional Info

* The display of the Confluence Page Gadget appears to be rather random, and can change once the page is refreshed. 
* Sometimes, both of them appear fine :

** !Page gadget C.png|thumbnail!

* Sometimes, one of them are shortened :

** !Page gadget A.png|thumbnail!

** !Page gadget B.png|thumbnail!

* So far, this can be reproduced in Chrome (version 27), and Internet Explorer 10. Firefox (version 21) does not seem to be affected
fields.summary: Confluence Page Gadget display is sometimes shortened

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29509].
  {panel}

If you try to create a Balsamiq mockup while on a page the editor sidebar gets in the way. See attached image.

Reproduction steps:
1. Create a page
2. Start a comment on a page
3. Insert menu
4. Create mockup (must have balsamiq plugin installed)
5. Edit the mockup

Expected results: Mockup editor should be the only thing on the page.
Actual results: Space sidebar covers important controls on the left hand side of the page like the `save mockup` button.

I've marked this as major because it makes saving a little confusing.
fields.summary: Confluence Space Sidebar occludes part of Balsimiq mockup editor

Could be useful to add 'Copy link to this Anchor' in the contextual menu. Similar at "link to page" into the page menu.

Thanks

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
# Open a wiki page on two tabs
# Add a comment with an image on one tab
# On the other tab, wait for the notification that a new comment is available and click on "Show" to show the new comment
# In the newly shown comment, clicking on the image in the comment does not show the pop up to show the full sized image

Link to Page or Attachment in Dynamic Tasklist
Note Incoming Page Links From Jira in Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29502].
  {panel}

I am currently writing a plug-in which shares pages by parsing incoming e-mail (https://github.com/schakko/Confluence-Mail-to-News-Plugin). The plug-in is realized as a trigger so there is no HttpServletContext available.

For the plug-in I use the SharePageImpl.sharePage() method but the call results in a NullPointerException: createWebResourceDataSource() access the ServletContextThreadLocal which is not available. 
To solve this issue I have to use the deprecated API method ServletContextThreadLocal.setRequest(new MockHttpServletRequest()) with a mocked/stubbed instance of HttpServletRequest (https://github.com/schakko/Confluence-Mail-to-News-Plugin/blob/master/src/main/java/com/midori/confluence/plugin/mail2news/MailToBlogPostPublisher.java#L109).

Please provide a method which initializes the ServletContextThreadLocal if a non-servlet plug-in runs or remove the @deprecated tag from ServletContextThreadLocal.setRequest().
fields.summary: API: Please provide a method to initialize the ServletContextThreadLocal from a trigger plug-in

fields.description:
h3.Steps to Reproduce:
# Add the Polish Keyboard Layout to Windows via {{Control Panel >> Region and Language >> Keyboard and Languages >> Change Keyboards}} and set it as the Default input language
# Launch the On-Screen Keyboard via {{Start >> Accessories >> Ease of Access >> On-Screen Keyboard}}
# Launch a web browser and attempt to add a page to Confluence
# In the Editor, try to insert the ś character into the Page Title (via AltGr + S , using the On-Screen keyboard), and notice that instead of adding that character, the page is saved instead (Interpreted as a Ctrl + S shortcut)

h3.Fixed in Confluence 5.x
Tested on Confluence 5.1.2. Issue cannot be reproduced in that version
fields.summary: Unable to type the ś character in the Page Title using Polish keyboard due to AltGr + S Keyboard Shortcut

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29499].
  {panel}

Our very early versions of Blueprints enforced structure.

For example, no matter where you were in the space, if you said Add > Meeting, it _always_ went under the meeting notes index page.

We had a bit of feedback about this from customers who typically had the "multiple projects per space" use case that this was frustrating. As an example, they would want a "file list" for every project. So they always had to move the page they created to under the appropriate project page. 

We feel that the primary problem here stems from the fact that Blueprints can only have one index page per space. If we had the ability to create multiple index pages per space, we could always enforce that blueprints are created under their index page and enforce this structure.
fields.summary: Enforce all blueprints to be placed under their index page / support multiple index pages per space

(I tried searching for this bug to see if it was already reported. I apologize if this is a duplicate)
fields.summary: Misspelling in confluence admin tools
Allow results in columns in the Page Properties Report Macro to wrap

fields.description:
Here is the steps to reproduce the problem. 
# On the LDAP server, create an parent organization unit for users with the attribute " ou=spacetest" rather than "ou=spacetest", then create an user with a normal attribute "cn=space". 
# Create an parent organization unit for groups with the attribute "ou=groups" then create a group with a normal attribute "cn=confluence-users".
# add the "uniquemember" attribute in the group with the value: "cn=space, ou=spacetest,o=confluence,dc=momo,dc=com".
# Create a new ldap user directory user directory with the settings. 
# After synchronization, the user space is added in Confluence but without any membership setting with the group "confluence-users"
{noformat}
2013-05-31 14:38:27,099 DEBUG [scheduler_Worker-1] [directory.ldap.cache.AbstractCacheRefresher] synchroniseMemberships Updating memberships for 2 groups from Apache Directory Server 1.5.x Directory 2981889
2013-05-31 14:38:27,099 DEBUG [scheduler_Worker-1] [atlassian.crowd.directory.RFC4519Directory] getEntityNamesAsMap Performing USER search: baseDN =  ou=spacetest,o=jira,dc=momo,dc=com - filter = (objectclass=inetorgperson)
2013-05-31 14:38:27,104 DEBUG [scheduler_Worker-1] [atlassian.crowd.directory.RFC4519Directory] getEntityNamesAsMap Performing GROUP search: baseDN = ou=groups,o=jira,dc=momo,dc=com - filter = (objectclass=groupOfUniqueNames)
2013-05-31 14:38:27,116 DEBUG [scheduler_Worker-1] [atlassian.crowd.directory.RFC4519DirectoryMembershipsIterable] apply Unexpected DN in group 'jira-users': cn=admin,ou=users,o=jira,dc=momo,dc=com
.......
2013-05-31 14:38:27,117 DEBUG [scheduler_Worker-1] [atlassian.crowd.directory.RFC4519DirectoryMembershipsIterable] apply Unexpected DN in group 'jira-users': cn=testuser@test,ou=users,o=jira,dc=momo,dc=com
2013-05-31 14:38:27,117 DEBUG [scheduler_Worker-1] [atlassian.crowd.directory.RFC4519DirectoryMembershipsIterable] apply Unexpected DN in group 'jira-users': cn=space,ou=speacetest,o=jira,dc=momo,dc=com
........
2013-05-31 14:38:27,118 DEBUG [scheduler_Worker-1] [directory.ldap.cache.AbstractCacheRefresher] synchroniseMemberships found [ 0 ] remote user-group memberships, [ 0 ] remote group-group memberships in [ 8ms ]
{noformat}
 Regarding to the log file, it seems that the space had been trimmed in the "uniquemember" attribute value, as it has to be:
{code}
cn=space, ou=speacetest,o=jira,dc=momo,dc=com
{code} 
Instead of 
{code}
cn=space,ou=speacetest,o=jira,dc=momo,dc=com
{code}
fields.summary: Membership not synchronized for the user who got space in the attribute name

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29494].
  {panel}

Hi,

we would be very happy with possibilty of copy attachments between spaces.

How it should works/scenario:

Page view -> Attachments
1. each attachment has tick box
2. at bottom of the page are fields
                  a) Page field using autocomplete 
                  b) Space field using autocomplete
3. confirmation button "Copy"

Procedure:
1. user tick attachments 
2. chose space
3. chose page
4. click on "Copy"
5. attachments are copied
fields.summary: Bulk copy of attachments
